text: Francis "Franny" Beecher (September 29, 1921 - February 24, 2014), also known as Frank Beecher, was an American country, jazz, and rock musician. He was the lead guitarist for Bill Haley & His Comets from 1954 to 1962. He was born in Norristown, Pennsylvania. Beecher died from natural causes on February 24, 2014 at a nursing home in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He was aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Musicians from Philadelphia Category:Country musicians from Pennsylvania Category:American jazz musicians Category:American rock guitarists
title: Franny Beecher
